TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit ResourceBundle/Control extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: ResourceBundle.Control defines a set of callback methods that are invoked by the ResourceBundle#getBundle(String, Locale, ClassLoader, Control) ResourceBundle.getBundle factory methods during the bundle loading process.

Docs.param: the base name of the resource bundle, a fully qualified class name for which ResourceBundle.getBundle has been unable to find any resource bundles (except for the base bundle)
the Locale for which ResourceBundle.getBundle has been unable to find any resource bundles (except for the base bundle)
Docs.summary: Returns a Locale to be used as a fallback locale for further resource bundle searches by the ResourceBundle.getBundle factory method.
Docs.returns: a Locale for the fallback search, or null if no further fallback search is desired.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual long GetTimeToLive (string baseName, Java.Util.Locale locale);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int64 GetTimeToLive(string baseName, class Java.Util.Locale locale) cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetTimeToLive (baseName As String, locale As Locale) As Long
public: virtual long GetTimeToLive(System::String ^ baseName, Java::Util::Locale ^ locale);
abstract member GetTimeToLive : string * Java.Util.Locale -> int64 override this.GetTimeToLive : string * Java.Util.Locale -> int64

Docs.param: the base name of the resource bundle for which the expiration value is specified.
the locale of the resource bundle for which the expiration value is specified.
Docs.summary: Returns the time-to-live (TTL) value for resource bundles that are loaded under this ResourceBundle.Control.
Docs.returns: the time (0 or a positive millisecond offset from the cached time) to get loaded bundles expired in the cache, #TTL_NO_EXPIRATION_CONTROL to disable the expiration control, or #TTL_DONT_CACHE to disable caching.

abstract member NeedsReload : string * Java.Util.Locale * string * Java.Lang.ClassLoader * Java.Util.ResourceBundle * int64 -> bool override this.NeedsReload : string * Java.Util.Locale * string * Java.Lang.ClassLoader * Java.Util.ResourceBundle * int64 -> bool
MemberSignature.Usage: control.NeedsReload (baseName, locale, format, loader, bundle, loadTime)

Docs.param: the base bundle name of the resource bundle, a fully qualified class name
the locale for which the resource bundle should be instantiated
the resource bundle format to be loaded
the ClassLoader to use to load the bundle
the resource bundle instance that has been expired in the cache
the time when bundle was loaded and put in the cache
Docs.summary: Determines if the expired bundle in the cache needs to be reloaded based on the loading time given by loadTime or some other criteria.
Docs.returns: true if the expired bundle needs to be reloaded; false otherwise.

Docs.param: the bundle name
the file type suffix
Docs.summary: Converts the given bundleName to the form required by the ClassLoader#getResource ClassLoader.getResource method by replacing all occurrences of '.' in bundleName with '/' and appending a '.' and the given file suffix.
